mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "On the Record", "Square Dance Date Book", "Feature Fashion", "As I See It", "Directory-Callers and Teachers Associations", "'Phrasing' by Terry Golden", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Interview: Don Armstrong", "Style Series: Remember Forward Six?", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "SIO Workshop", "Caller of the Month: John Kaltenthaler, Pocono Pines, Pa.", "Paging the Roundancers: Len and Winnie Taylor, Ludlow, Mass.", "Current Best Sellers", and "Experimental Lab".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
